dialogue.speaker: aabc84cf-a6d4-4131-b7f9-d344da5bed8c
dialogue.subtitleText:
Legendary Fighter Pilot Area Riley once said Give me a fully loaded Hornet, and I ll shake the gates of Heaven.
Anvil Aerospaces Hornets have faced Vanduul, Shion, Pirates and Criminals.
Anvil Aerospaces Hornets have logged more combat time and kills in more theatres than any other ship in the history of Space Combat.
Battle Tested in the harshest conditions, the Hornet has proven time and again its ability to withstand damage, and still be able to dish it out.
With all the punishment it handles on a daily basis, don=t you think the new Hornet can handle yours
Anvil s New Hornet F7C, see your authorized ship dealer for options.
